Line 76: Line 76:
==Portable applications==
==Portable applications==
â
It is complicated to install applications on the RAM of a Live CD, and all the changes made to those programs and the installation itself will be lost once the computer is rebooted, so a good alternative is to use [[portable applications]] that can be run from either the Live CD or from a [[USB flash drive]] connected to the computer. There is even software dedicated to create those portable applications (for example, [[VMware ThinApp]] or [[Virtual Application Studio ISV Edition]]).
+
It is complicated to install applications on the RAM of a Live CD, and all the changes made to those programs and the installation itself will be lost once the computer is rebooted, so a good alternative is to use [[portable applications]] that can be run from either the Live CD or from a [[USB flash drive]] connected to the computer. There is even software dedicated to create those portable applications (for example, [[VMware ThinApp]] or [[Virtual Application Studio]]).
==See also==
